name: Coinlocally Coin
description: Exchange Trading Platform - All in One Blockchain Ecosystem CLYC is the native cryptocurrency token of the crypto trading platform of Coinlocally Exchange. Coinlocally is a global trading platform that combines cryptocurrency and forex markets, leading a journey from centralized exchange (CEX) to decentralized exchange (DEX) and Web3 innovation. We are currently in Phase 1 of our roadmap, operating as a centralized exchange (CEX), and are preparing to launch our native token. This is a key step toward transforming Coinlocally from just an exchange into a full-fledged ecosystem centered around Web3 innovation.
